Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.service.Service<E>

          org.magnos.task.TaskService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, org.magnos.resource.Resource, org.magnos.service.EventHandler<Task<?>>, org.magnos.service.ServiceListener<Task<?>>, TaskEventHandler, org.magnos.util.Sleepable
public class TaskService
extends org.magnos.service.AbstractService<Task<?>>
implements TaskEventHandler, org.magnos.resource.Resource

A service which can process any type of task.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

TaskService

public TaskService(boolean blocking)
Instantiates a new TaskService.

Parameters:
blocking - Whether the event queue for this service blocks when it polls for events or whether it returns immediately when empty.
